医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的生物反应器可以加速癌症免疫疗法的获得一种快速生长抗癌白细胞的新工具可以促进免疫疗法的可用性，这是一种利用人体对目标癌细胞的免疫反应的力量的有前途的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-bioreactor-could-accelerate-access-to-cancer-killing-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-bioreactor-could-accelerate-access-to-cancer-killing-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ab76120-d1bf-4363-ae60-e38fc91648b1 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 14:16:30 -0400 New bioreactor could accelerate access to cancer-killing immunotherapy
蛋白质相互作用的发现可能会带来新的精神分裂症治疗方法研究人员表示，在小鼠脑细胞中发现两种蛋白质之间存在物理相互作用，这种相互作用可以控制运动、焦虑和记忆，有朝一日可能为开发新的精神分裂症治疗策略打开大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Discovery-of- Protein-interaction-could-lead-to-new-schizophrenia-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Discovery-of- Protein-interaction-could-lead-to-new-schizophrenia-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d121d23-068f-4e74-a77c-b36fcf788aaa Thu, 26 Oct 2023 14:11:32 -0400 Discovery of protein interaction could lead to new schizophrenia treatments
研究有助于识别严重 RSV 感染风险最高的儿童一项新研究有助于确定严重呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 感染风险最高的儿童，从而从新的 RSV 预防措施中受益最多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Study-helps-identify-children-at-the-highest-risk-of-severe-RSV-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Study-helps-identify-children-at-the-highest-risk-of-severe-RSV-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfa84354-bd33-43d0-9275-0b177edada02 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 13:59:09 -0400 Study helps identify children at the highest risk of severe RSV infection
新的 AI-nanopore 平台可能会彻底改变 COVID-19 测试快速、准确地检测 COVID-19 感染的方法将是克服该病毒对我们社会影响的一大进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-AI-nanopore-platform-could-revolutionize-COVID-19-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-AI-nanopore-platform-could-revolutionize-COVID-19-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ae8bb44-08f2-408e-9609-cafcf9c64a11 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 13:45:49 -0400 New AI-nanopore platform could revolutionize COVID-19 testing
研究人员获得 1060 万欧元用于开发针对胶质母细胞瘤的新治疗方法阿姆斯特丹大学和莱顿大学的研究人员与荷兰癌症研究所（阿姆斯特丹）和 Oncode 研究所（乌得勒支）一起获得了 1060 万欧元的 ERC 协同补助金，用于开发针对胶质母细胞瘤的创新治疗方法，胶质母细胞瘤是一种无法治愈的致命原发性脑肿瘤目前尚有治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Researchers-receive-e282ac106-million-to-develop-new-therapeutic-approaches-to-target-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Researchers-receive-e282ac106-million-to-develop-new-therapeutic-approaches-to-target-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61f80ceb-8deb-44fc-8233-fa50d01aa980 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 13:36:00 -0400 Researchers receive €10.6 million to develop new therapeutic approaches to target glioblastoma
对新的阿尔茨海默氏症血液检测的质疑比比皆是担心自己患阿尔茨海默病风险的人们第一次可以上网预约验血，并在家中私密地收到结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Doubts-abound-about-a-new-Alzheimere28099s-blood-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Doubts-abound-about-a-new-Alzheimere28099s-blood-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad8c6b61-a636-4132-bd11-bc1d0d3b558f Thu, 26 Oct 2023 09:10:12 -0400 Doubts abound about a new Alzheimer’s blood test
产前接触皮质类固醇和 β2 激动剂的时间是否会影响孩子 3 岁时的神经发育？研究人员调查了子宫内接触 β2 激动剂和皮质类固醇的时间与后代生命最初三年神经发育里程碑之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Does-the-timing-of-prenatal-exposure-to-corticosteroids-and-ceb22-agonists-impact-a-childs-neurodevelopment-by-age- 3.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Does-the-timing-of-prenatal-exposure-to-corticosteroids-and-ceb22-agonists-impact-a-childs-neurodevelopment-by-age- 3.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b04ab78-ce95-4d97-80a0-0729b928838d Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:58:00 -0400 Does the timing of prenatal exposure to corticosteroids and β2-agonists impact a child's neurodevelopment by age 3?
健康饮食可能是降低慢性阻塞性肺病风险的关键因素饮食质量与慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）发病率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Healthy-eating-may-be-a-key-player-in-COPD-risk-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Healthy-eating-may-be-a-key-player-in-COPD-risk-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84089ec5-0112-4e2b-8fe1-050f59e3fb27 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:40:00 -0400 Healthy eating may be a key player in COPD risk reduction
对于急性心肌梗塞患者，在标准治疗中添加中药复方是否可以改善预后？研究人员调查了中药复方通心络是否可以改善 ST 段抬高型心肌梗死患者的临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/In-acute-myocardial-infarction-病人-does-adding-a-traditional-Chinese-medicine-compound-to-standard-treatments-improve-outcomes。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/In-acute-myocardial-infarction-病人-does-adding-a-traditional-Chinese-medicine-compound-to-standard-treatments-improve-outcomes。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=460579bb-410e-4226-a699-3cc90d4dae40 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:38:00 -0400 In acute myocardial infarction patients, does adding a traditional Chinese medicine compound to standard treatments improve outcomes?
与男性相比，拉杰沙希的已婚女性患抑郁症的比例更高孟加拉国拉杰沙希市已婚成年人抑郁症相关的性别因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Married-women-in-Rajshahi-show-higher-rates-of-depression-compared-to-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Married-women-in-Rajshahi-show-higher-rates-of-depression-compared-to-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ecc901f-b732-4dd0-b7ad-d56a3f1ff971 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:15:00 -0400 Married women in Rajshahi show higher rates of depression compared to men
